**Error: Missing resource instance key**
│
│   on outputs.tf line 30, in output "api_gateway_endpoint":
│   30:   value       = google_api_gateway_gateway.api_gateway.default_hostname
│
│ Because google_api_gateway_gateway.api_gateway has "count" set, its
│ attributes must be accessed on specific instances.
│
│ For example, to correlate with indices of a referring resource, use:
│     google_api_gateway_gateway.api_gateway[count.index]
╵
